response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $12,000. This price not only reflects the product's true worth but also offers you a significant discount compared to the market rate. I am confident that you will find this offer compelling and beneficial. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
